arts.ttl: Liverpool and Arsenal learn Martin Zubimendi transfer stance ahead of January transfer window
arts.sum: Liverpool and Arsenal have been the two best teams in the Premier League this season. Both the clubs, who are currently involved in the title race, will enter the January transfer window to strengthen their squads and to try to gain an advantage in the title race. arts.ttl: Sources: Martin Zubimendi's January transfer stance as Arsenal and Liverpool circle
arts.sum: Arsenal and Liverpool are both flying high this season and both are firmly in the running for both the Premier League and the Champions League....

arts.ttl: Man City, Liverpool 'on red alert' as Martin Zubimendi 'makes major transfer decision'
arts.sum: Spain international Martin Zubimendi is reportedly open to leaving Real Sociedad next summer amid interest from Manchester City and Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Liverpool, Manchester City on alert as Martin Zubimendi now open to leaving Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Over the last 2-3 years, Martin Zubimendi has regularly been linked with a move away from Real Sociedad. The closest that came to becoming a reality was last summer when Liverpool came calling, but in the end, he opted to remain at his boyhood club. However, the situation appears to have changed. arts.ttl: Real Sociedad dealt fresh injury setback
arts.sum: La Liga outfit Real Sociedad have this week been dealt a fresh blow on the personnel front. This comes amid confirmation of an injury suffered by Beñat Turrientes. Midfielder Turrientes,…
